Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The hole mobility of the pristine PSFDTBT film spin - cast from o-dichlorobenzene ( DCB ) solution is 7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 with on / off ratios in the order of 10^5 .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| o-dichlorobenzene (DCB) |

Explanation:

* "PSFDTBT" is a material name, as it is an abbreviation for a specific type of organic semiconductor.
* "o-dichlorobenzene (DCB)" is also a material name, as it is a specific type of solvent used in the preparation of the PSFDTBT film.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| o-dichlorobenzene (DCB) |

Explanation:

* "PSFDTBT" is a material name, as it is an abbreviation for a specific type of organic semiconductor.
* "o-dichlorobenzene (DCB)" is also a material name, as it is a specific type of solvent used in the preparation of the PSFDTBT film.
